= OWL Axiomatization =

The OWL axioms for MP are in the [http://phenotype-ontologies.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/src/ontology/mp/ src/ontology/mp] directory on this site.

 * http://purl.obolibrary.org/obo/mp.owl - basic OWL version
 * http://purl.obolibrary.org/obo/mp/mp-importer.owl - imports additional axioms, including the following ones below:
       * rdf:resource="http://purl.obolibrary.org/obo/mp.owl
        * rdf:resource="http://purl.obolibrary.org/obo/upheno/imports/chebi_import.owl
        * rdf:resource="http://purl.obolibrary.org/obo/upheno/imports/uberon_import.owl
        * rdf:resource="http://purl.obolibrary.org/obo/upheno/imports/pato_import.owl
        * rdf:resource="http://purl.obolibrary.org/obo/upheno/imports/go_import.owl
        * rdf:resource="http://purl.obolibrary.org/obo/upheno/imports/mpath_import.owl
        * rdf:resource="http://purl.obolibrary.org/obo/mp/mp-equivalence-axioms-subq-ubr.owl
